features.llmInstructions: This is the features section for the website. The cards should be a list of 3 cards with the title, description, and icon. The icon should be a valid icon from the lucide icon library.

problem.title: The Content Creation Dilemma
problem.subtitle: Content marketing isn't working like it used to. The landscape has changed, but many teams haven't adapted.
problem.resultSubtitle: Wasted budget, missed opportunities, and stalled growth.

cards.title: Only 5.7% of Content Ranks
cards.description: Most blog posts never reach the first page of Google, making the vast majority of your content investment a wasted effort.

cards.title: Time-Intensive Process
cards.description: The average blog post takes 4+ hours to create, and even longer when you factor in SEO research and optimization.

cards.title: Disconnected Workflows
cards.description: Most teams use 4+ different tools for ideation, writing, SEO, and publishing, creating inefficient workflows and lost insights.

problem.llmInstructions: This is the problem section that highlights challenges users face. The icon should be a valid icon from the lucide icon library.

solution.title: The All-in-One SEO Content Platform
solution.subtitle: RankWell brings together every step of the content creation process into a single, streamlined workflow.

steps.title: Identify Trending Topics
steps.description: Our AI scans the web to identify trending topics in your industry and analyzes search patterns to uncover high-potential keywords with lower competition.

steps.title: Generate SEO-Optimized Content
steps.description: RankWell's AI generates comprehensive, factually accurate blog posts built around your target keywords, following proven SEO frameworks.

steps.title: Optimize & Analyze
steps.description: Get real-time SEO scores and actionable recommendations to improve your content's ranking potential before you publish.

steps.title: Publish & Track
steps.description: Push content directly to WordPress, HubSpot, or export to your CMS. Then track performance to continuously improve your strategy.

solution.llmInstructions: This is the solution section that presents the product as the answer to the problems described in the previous section.

pricing.title: Choose Your Perfect Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start with a free trial. No credit card required.
pricing.llmInstructions: This is the pricing section for the website. Make sure to not create more than 4 products.
